hero.description: An open-source investigative platform for documenting human rights abuse, corruption, and procedural injustice using verified evidence and transparent methodology.

values.sectionDescription: HRPM is a non-profit organization dedicated to documenting human rights abuse and supporting those whose fundamental rights have been violated.
values.justiceDesc: Fair treatment under the law for everyone.

featuredCase.title: Case File #001:
featuredCase.name: Danish Thanvi
featuredCase.description: This case study demonstrates HRPM's methodology for evidence-based human rights documentation. It includes documented cases of business interference, harassment, and procedural failures—serving as a reference for how the platform transforms raw evidence into structured intelligence.

capabilities.title: Tools for
capabilities.description: Purpose-built modules designed for journalists, researchers, and legal advocates to transform raw evidence into structured, verifiable intelligence.
